'''"Maison Cardinalice's Little Helper"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Maison Cardinalice's Little Helper" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Fontaine]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest after solving a puzzle in the [[Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region]].
